entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
